title: MA51112: Discrete Dynamical Systems - Quick Facts
text:
MA51112
Course name | Discrete Dynamical Systems
Offered by | Mathematics
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidPhase Portraits, Periodic Points and Stable Sets, Sarkovskiis Theorem, Hyperbolic, Attracting and Repelling Periodic Points. Families of Dynamical Systems, Bifurcation, Topological Conjugacy. The Logistic Function, Cantor Sets and Chaos, Period-Doubling Cascade. Symbolic Dynamics. Newtons Method. Numerical Solutions of Differential Equations. Complex Dynamics, Quadratic Family, Julia Sets, Mandelbrot Set. Topological Entropy, Attractors and Fractals, Theory of Chaotic Dynamical systems.
